round 27 single_crochet decrease around finish off and leave a long end weave in and out of the single_crochet on the last row pull together make sure the whole of the hat is closed weave in ends and finish off using the clover pom-pom maker make your pom-pom with the size 6 chunky yarn attach pom-pom to hat weave in any ends wear and enjoy -kids&knots- tutorial pictures wst waistcoat stitch the waistcoat stitch is done by crocheting a single_crochet in the middle of a single crochet from previous row insert your hook into the middle of the v yarn over you will now have two loops on your hook yarn over and pull through both loops you will have two loops on your hook pull through both of these to complete your stitch how to hold your yarn to the back how to change colors have your back
